content: Descrpition Piano LED for Arduino (PLA) is a piano visualizer, it is free, lightweight, without Ad. application that allows you to controll LED-Strips during you playing digital piano (you still need an Arduino board, like UNO). It is able to receive MIDI message from your digital piano and transmit the MIDI data to Arduino, so that Arduino is able to control LEDs with the MIDI-Streaming.
title: MacOS - Piano LED for Arduino (Piano Visualizer)

content: Download Links Piano LED for Arduino v1.0: Google Drive Mega Upload
title: MacOS - Piano LED for Arduino (Piano Visualizer)

content: Demo Videos If you really do not know how to programm or do not have any of hardware knowlege, you can ask me to buy complet sets or send me your device, but I will charge you 20 Euro (excl. postage) in return for coffee üòÑ Do NOT stare at the LED for a long time, it will permanently damage your eyes!
title: MacOS - Piano LED for Arduino (Piano Visualizer)

content: Working Principle (Data Flow) workflow
title: MacOS - Piano LED for Arduino (Piano Visualizer)

content: Requirement Arduino Uno Two meter LED Strip (144/meter, model WS2812B) 330 ohm resistor (optional) Three Jumper wires (other similar wires are also OK) Two USB cables (type B), used to connect Arduino and MIDI-Device to your Mac A Mac with operating system Big Sur(MacOS 11.0) or above Digital Piano or a MIDI-Keyboard
title: MacOS - Piano LED for Arduino (Piano Visualizer)

content: Preparation Turn on the piano‚Äôs MIDI transmission function. Connecting your digital computer to your Mac. Following the next figure, correctly connect the WS2812B light strip (in this case with Arduino Uno). Normally, the red port of the light strip need the 5V power as input, the white wire is ground (GND), and the green cable needs to connect to port 9. For details please refer to the description of the light strip for the specific connection method. red ‚Üí 5V input; greed ‚Üí 330 oh resistance (resistance is optional) to pin 9; white ‚Üí GND Download and install Arduino IDE for Mac and save Arduino Stekch. An simple Arduino sketch sample is also included in this application. You can easily save this sketch by clicking File -> Save Arduino Sketch to Disk Save sketch to your mac Add FastLED library to your Arduino bibliothek. Upload the saved arduino Sketch to Uno. Turn on your piano and connect Arduino Uno to your Mac. You must turn on your piano before you start this app, otherwise the PLA will not connect to your piano. Start your App, and enjoy.
title: MacOS - Piano LED for Arduino (Piano Visualizer)

content: Quick Start Arduino only needs to be set up once! In the future if you play with Piano LED for Arduino, you only need to use a USB cable to connect Arduino to your Mac. Connect Arduino (Assum you have already uploaded the sketch to Arduino) and your digital piano via USB cable to your Mac and then turn on your digital piano Select the Arduino port by click left or right arrow, default port name is usbmodem14201 (it may different) Press Power button at right top corner to connect to Arduino. When you see the the LED indicator start blinking from A0 to C6, you are able to play with that. Enjoy yourself üòÑ The test environment is with Arduino Uno, MacBook Pro 16 (2019), Roland FP-90. It is not guaranteed to be compatible with other test environments. If you encounter any LED lights flickering during the performance, you can try to restart the software or disconnect the device to try again. If you still have problems, please write and submit a bug.
title: MacOS - Piano LED for Arduino (Piano Visualizer)

content: About transmission message The message which generated from PLA is only one byte, it contains note on/off status and note number. Note status is at first bit and the last seven bits are note number.
title: MacOS - Piano LED for Arduino (Piano Visualizer)

content: Note Status If the first bit is one, that means the piano key note is pressed (note on status), which in decimal will be added by 128.
title: MacOS - Piano LED for Arduino (Piano Visualizer)

content: Note Number There are totally 88 key notes on piano, therefor the range of this transmission message is [21~108] = [0x15~0x6c] = 0b[0001 0101 ~ 0110 1100].
title: MacOS - Piano LED for Arduino (Piano Visualizer)

content: Example If key note A0 (the first key of your piano) is release, PLA will send 21(0x15) to Arduino, when this key is pressed, PLA will send 149(21+128) to Arduino. If key note C8 (the last key of your piano) is release, PLA will send 108(0x6C) to Arduino, when this key is pressed, PLA will send 236(108+128) to Arduino.
title: MacOS - Piano LED for Arduino (Piano Visualizer)

content: Download App Store Product Features: Three different passwords to adapt to various situations. Normal Password: with this password will show your ordinary documents. Super Password: In order to show/hide your secret files. Emergency Password: this password will delete all your secret files before log in the app. Non-subscription system, once purchased for life. Working without networking, fully localized operation, completely eliminate privacy. A special double encryption method maximizes the hiding of your personal photos and videos. You can set the hidden status for each folder individually. Support file backup / recovery, to ensure that personal data will not be lost. Record access logs, allowing you to view unauthorized access at any time. Wireless transmission, Break-In report and other features comming soon‚Ä¶ Settings If the TouchID/FaceID function ist turned on (default setting is off), signing in to the app by TouchID/FaceID is equivalent to signing in with your normal password. Do not worry, if she/he can log in this app with touch ID, she/he can only see your regular files. With normal passwords you can only view non-hidden folders. If you want to hide something, please put your files into secret folders. If the 2-Step Verification (in Advanced Settings) is on, click the Setting tab bar button five (default value) times will display hidden folders and Advanced Setting. With Super Passwords you can access to your hidden folders and turn on the Advance Settings. The Emergency Password is only for this following emergency situations: If she/he knows you have something to hidden and forces you to log in with super password. You can remove ALL your privacy files with this password! NEVER try to enter this password unless you know what you are doing. Advanced Settings: There are two ways to show advanced settingsÔºö After logging in with normal password (or touch ID), click the ‚Äúsetting‚Äù button in the bottom right corner of the screen for 5 times, then at the password interface using touch ID to login again, the¬†‚Äú2-Step Verification‚Äù must be on. Enter the super password directly in the start interface.
title: Secret Hider

content: 2-Step Verification (default value: off): 2 step verification helps you to quickly see your privacy files while signed in with your normal password. When you log in with your TouchID or normal password, click the ‚ÄúSetting‚Äù button in the lower right corner of the screen five (default value) times to turn on the advanced settings mode You can also change the number of clicks.
title: Secret Hider

content: Access Record (default value: on): Due to the limitation of apple, this app can not record the face in the background, when someone enters the wrong password, it will automatically record the current time, you can see that unnecessary access log¬†at any time.
title: Secret Hider

content: Backup: I personally recommend that you back up regularly to prevent your valuable data from being lost. Please note that all files will be backed up. The backup process may take many minutes, depending on the contents of your folder, such as a large number of videos, etc. Please be patient until the backup is complete. Do not exit the program during the backup process,¬†so it may damage your data. Before back up you need to enter a backup password for your¬†whole folder, if you forget this password, you will not be able to restore this backup, so please keep your personal password carefully. After the backup is complete, your phone will automatically generates an encrypted zip file that you can copy into your personal computer by using iTunes or other assistant software.
title: Secret Hider

content: Restore: The recovery process is similar to the backup process, you can either import backup files from your computer to your phone or you can restore directly from your phone‚Äôs backup files. Please note that when you restore the backup, all the current files in your phone will be deleted
title: Secret Hider

content: Upload/Send Backup Files: If you have any Questions or Suggestions, please leave a message to me. Mach dir keine Sorgen, wenn er / sie sich diese App mit Touch ID einloggen kann, kann er / sie nur deine normalen Dateien sehen. Wenn du etwas verstecken m√∂chtest, lege bitte deine Dateien in den Ordner ‚Äú****Private Ordner‚Äù Verstecken‚Äù (n√§chster Schritt) Tipps: Wenn die ‚ÄúBest√§tigung in zwei Schritten (in den erweiterten Einstellungen)‚Äù aktiviert ist, klicken Sie auf die Registerkarte ‚ÄúEinstellung‚Äù auf der Registerkarte ‚Äúf√ºnf‚Äù (Standardwert), um versteckte Dateien direkt anzuzeigen. Super Password: Das Super-Passwort wird verwendet, um Ihre Privatsph√§re-Dateien anzuzeigen. Mit Super-Passw√∂rtern k√∂nnen Sie auf Ihre versteckten Dateien zugreifen und die erweiterten Einstellungen aktivieren. Wenn die TouchID-Funktion deaktiviert ist, k√∂nnen Sie NUR auf Ihre privaten Dateien zugreifen, indem Sie Ihr Super-Passwort eingeben. Selbstzerst√∂rung ‚Äì Passwort: Das Selbstzerst√∂rungs-Passwort gilt nur f√ºr folgende Notfallsituationen: Wenn sie / er wei√ü, dass du etwas zu verstecken hast, zwingst du dich mit super Passwort einzuloggen. Mit diesem Passwort werden ALLE Ihre Privatsph√§re-Dateien gel√∂scht, bevor Sie sich in diese App einloggen! Versuchen Sie NIEMALS, dieses Passwort einzugeben, es sei denn, Sie wissen, was Sie tun. Erweiterte Einstellungen: Es gibt zwei M√∂glichkeiten, erweiterte Einstellungen anzuzeigen: Nach dem Einloggen mit normalem Passwort (oder Touch-ID), klicken Sie auf die Schaltfl√§che ‚ÄúEinstellung‚Äù in der rechten unteren Ecke des Bildschirms f√ºr 5-mal, dann an der Passwort-Schnittstelle mit Touch-ID erneut einloggen, muss die ‚Äú2-Schritt-Verifikation‚Äù an sein. Geben Sie das Super-Passwort direkt in der Startoberfl√§che ein.
title: Secret Hider

content: 2-Step Verification (default value: off): Die Best√§tigung in zwei Schritten hilft Ihnen, Ihre Datenschutzdateien schnell zu sehen, w√§hrend Sie mit Ihrem normalen Passwort angemeldet sind. Wenn Sie sich mit Ihrer Touch-ID oder Ihrem normalen Passwort anmelden, klicken Sie auf die Schaltfl√§che ‚ÄúEinstellungen‚Äù in der unteren rechten Ecke des Bildschirms f√ºnf (Standardwert) mal, um den erweiterten Einstellungsmodus zu aktivieren. Sie k√∂nnen auch die Anzahl der Klicks √§ndern.

content: Zugriffsdatensatz (Standardwert: ein): Aufgrund der Beschr√§nkung von Apple, kann diese App das Gesicht nicht im Hintergrund aufnehmen, wenn jemand das falsche Passwort eingibt, wird es automatisch die aktuelle Zeit aufzeichnen, k√∂nnen Sie sehen, dass unn√∂tige Zugriffsprotokoll jederzeit.
title: Secret Hider

content: Sicherung: Ich empfehle Ihnen, regelm√§√üig zu sichern, um zu verhindern, dass Ihre wertvollen Daten verloren gehen. Bitte beachten Sie, dass alle Dateien gesichert werden. Je nach Inhalt Ihres Ordners, z. B. einer gro√üen Anzahl von Videos usw., kann der Sicherungsvorgang viele Minuten dauern. Bitte haben Sie etwas Geduld, bis die Sicherung abgeschlossen ist. Beenden Sie das Programm nicht w√§hrend des Sicherungsvorgangs, da dies Ihre Daten besch√§digen k√∂nnte. Vor der Sicherung m√ºssen Sie ein Sicherungskennwort f√ºr Ihren gesamten Ordner eingeben. Wenn Sie dieses Kennwort vergessen, k√∂nnen Sie diese Sicherung nicht wiederherstellen. Bewahren Sie daher Ihr pers√∂nliches Kennwort sorgf√§ltig auf. Nachdem die Sicherung abgeschlossen ist, erstellt das Telefon automatisch eine verschl√ºsselte ZIP-Datei, die Sie mithilfe von iTunes oder einer anderen Hilfssoftware auf Ihren PC kopieren k√∂nnen.
title: Secret Hider

content: Wiederherstellen: Der Wiederherstellungsvorgang √§hnelt dem Sicherungsprozess. Sie k√∂nnen entweder Sicherungsdateien von Ihrem Computer auf Ihr Telefon importieren oder direkt von den Sicherungsdateien Ihres Telefons wiederherstellen. Beachten Sie, dass beim Wiederherstellen der Sicherung alle aktuellen Dateien auf Ihrem Telefon gel√∂scht werden

title: Secret Hider

content: If you want to leave a message, please use English, German or Chinese Download App Store Description If you intend to export cars to China, this application is your best helper. This application can quickly verify the vehicle identification code and tells you whether your car can be exported to China. It may save you a lot of time to contact with Chinese customers. Features: Fast and convenient, fully localized operation. All data will not be uploadedÔºåthat will protect your car supplier and your secret. Verification of the results is only for reference, resulting in all losses do not bear any legal responsibility. Requirements: iOS 9.0+ Usage: In the Verification page you should input your 17-digits and letters of the vehicle identification number. Please pay attention to the number of remaining queries, when the number of queries less than 1,¬†the software can not get¬†any information. Notice: VIN is the most important condition, but is not the only rule that can import a car to China. Such as steering wheel position (Britisch car), color of brake light (American car) and other conditions. But the European car is not described in front of the problem. Some diesel cars will have also problems, because those cars can not drive in some cities (like Beijing, Shanghai). You still need to ask your customer whether they want to buy a diesel car. Others: If you have any other questions, please contact me through the contact information in the app. Thank you
title: VIN Checker

content: Love classical music and all beautiful things and always entertaining himself in spare time. Since 2009 until now, he have been living in Germany for a long time. He studied Media Technology at the Technical University TU Ilmenau in a small city in Germany and taught himself iOS/MacOS programming in his spare time. After 2019, he worked as an intern in VR/AR at Volkswagen AG‚Äôs R&D department in Wolfsburg city in Germany. Internship in the field of VR/AR. Since 2022 until now he is working at the German Federal Institute for Road Research (Bundesanstalt f√ºr Stra√üenwesen, BASt) mainly on VR/AR research projects in the field of road safety. If you have any questions, please email me.
